pr_title: server: don't export B&R APIs if feature is not enabled globally

timeline.message:
server: don't export APIs if feature is not enabled in any zones

This change will ensure that B&R APIs are not exported if the feature
is not enabled in any of the zones.

Signed-off-by: Rohit Yadav <rohit.yadav@shapeblue.com>
